job.title: Information Technology System Administrator
job.description: REDiTECH RedEyeTekbrbrOur MissionbrWe strive to deliver a truly remarkable service that provides our Clients the ability to utilize technology in reliable and innovative waysbrbrOur VisionbrTo merge technology and security to solve intricate business problems for all companiesbrbrOur ValuesbrAct like an OWNERbrHave a GROWTH mindsetbrHONESTY is nonnegotiablebrINTEGRITY is our most valuable assetbrShow DEDICATION in all tasksbrApproach all problems with CREATIVITYbrbrWhere We Are TodaybrWe are currently in a rapid growth pattern and we are looking for solid team players that want to come along for the ride Technical skills are a given for a System Engineer but we are also looking to bring on technicians with great personalities positive attitudes and an unshakable drive to succeed We are growing and evolving and that type of environment will keep you on your toes If you are motivated by growth problem solving and accountability we want to hear from youbrbrJob purposebrSystems Administrators will provide and demonstrate high level of customer service and ensure client satisfaction of service Systems Administrators will be responsible for maintaining and accurately documenting all work within service tickets as well as technical documentation for the office and their equipment We are looking for a competent Systems Administrators to provide fast and useful technical assistance on computer systems You will answer questions on basic technical issues and offer advice to solve them The goal is to create value for clients that will help preserve the companys reputation and businessbrbrResponsibilitiesbr Front line documentationbr Service Tickets Knowledgebase Articles Site Configuration Changesbr Installation troubleshooting repairing and managing PC and Mac workstationsbr Installation troubleshooting repairing and managing Windows Serversbr Installation troubleshooting repairing and managing Remote Management Softwarebr Installation troubleshooting repairing and managing Microsoft Active Directorybr Installation troubleshooting repairing and managing LANsWANsWLANsbr Installation troubleshooting repairing and managing routers switches Firewall policies configurations and managementbr Installation troubleshooting repairing and managing Network Security Disaster Recovery Configuration and DNS Configurationsbr Proactive monitoring of alerts patch management health checks administrationmaintenance of remote monitoring systems and disaster recovery solutionsbr Support issues related to internal and network infrastructure Virtualization Services with VMware support services for Microsoft Related Technologies Remote Access Solutions and Network Level Support for LANWANWLANbr Work with Clients and Team to complete Support Ticketsbr Assist special projects team for client deploymentsbr Provide onsite and remote assistance as neededbr Provide verbal andor written training sessionsdocuments such as how to guides for troubleshooting andor user guides for our internal Teams and external ClientsbrbrQualificationsbr Positive attitudebr A desire to contributebr Motivation to grow personally and professionallybrTop Candidates Will Have A Combination Of Some Or All Of The Following Skillsbr 3 years experience with Microsoft and Mac Workstation Operating Systems or equivalent work experiencebr 3 years Experience with Microsoft Office Internet Browsers Mobile applications or equivalent work experiencebr 3 years experience with Microsoft Active Directory Disaster Recovery Configuration and VMware or equivalent work experiencebr 3 years experience with LANsWANsWLANs or equivalent work experiencebr 3 years experience with routers switches firewall policies configurations and management or equivalent work experiencebr 3 years experience with Network Security Disaster Recovery Configuration and DNS Configurations or equivalent work experiencebr 3 years experience Customer Service IT related field preferred or equivalent work experiencebr ConnectWise ExperiencebrbrJob Type FulltimebrPay 5000000  7000000 per yearbr
